metadata.title: CVE-2019-8381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tcpreplay 4.3.1. An invalid memory access occursin do_checksum in checksum.c. It can be triggered by sending a crafted pcapfile to the tcpreplay-edit binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denialof Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
